Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! I've been playing quite a lot for the last 2 months or so and I've found myself quite bored by the rocket command modules/pods. The single-passenger one isn't TOO bad but the 3 person module/pod is an eyesore to me.

I've seen the Dragon 2 replica as well as the Orion replica but they seem to have many unattached parts. (They do both look amazing).

I'm looking for additional well designed modules/pods/capsules or whatever. Any kick in the right direction would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks!
